attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: after watching 2days news(11 07 09)10 soldies killed in afganistan i would like mr gordan brown to tell the british public wot our soldiers are being killed for he told us that he as got the strategy right but 10 dead soldiers he he just be kidding himself.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
